title: ABI Research Hires Dr Mo Haghighi to Strengthen Leadership Position in IoT Market Intelligence
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 7:29 AM   ABI Research 
OYSTER BAY, N.Y. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- ABI Research announces that Dr. Mo Haghighi has joined the company in the position of Senior Analyst focusing on IoT and IoE semiconductors. After a significant tenure in the research community focusing on sensors and sensor networking he joins ABI Research’s Strategic Technologies Group under the leadership of Dr. Malik Saadi. 
“The arrival of Dr. Haghighi demonstrates our commitment to further extend and improve what is already the most experienced and largest stable of dedicated analysts covering IoE and IoT. His highly relevant experience in this nascent market dovetails nicely with our research agenda that continues to drive deeper into end user markets,” said Stuart Carlaw, ABI Research Chief Research Officer. 
Before joining ABI Research, Dr Haghighi was a research assistant in the department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering at the University of Bristol. Whilst being involved in the SPHERE project (in collaboration with IBM and TOSHIBA), his research involved developing wearable and environmental sensors as well as integrating optimization algorithms, in order to facilitate energy-efficient operation and optimal data gathering in sensor-based healthcare technologies. He also worked as a postdoctoral research assistant in Wireless Sensor Networks Forensics within the Network Security group, where he investigated security-related issues in large-scale sensor networks, IoT, and cloud-based data-gathering as part of a European project: FORTOO (FORensic TOOls). 
ABI Research provides technology market research and technology intelligence for industry innovators. From offices in North America, Europe and Asia, ABI Research’s worldwide team of experts advises thousands of decision makers through 70+ research and advisory services. Est. 1990.
